ios.subtitle: Connect the Dots in One Line

editorialNotes.short: Make a square, how hard is that? Spoiler alert, it is.
Build settlements, explore islands, and defend territories. Are you ready to rule?

editorialNotes.standard: Stunning doesn’t even begin to describe it. In this unique puzzler, the animations are just as rewarding as the gameplay. We never got tired of watching the board unfold in a blossom of colourful origami. Our favourite new feature? An editor that lets you create your own gorgeous puzzles and share them with the world.
editorialNotes.short: We loved playing with these paper puzzles - every fold is a tactile delight.

ios.subtitle: Color by Number: Happy and Fun
